entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High plus 5 except 9 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5 except 9 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
